body: Uncommon Sense has been following the recent arrest of Cuban independent journalist Guillermo Fariñas and calls his detainment a "We told you so" moment. He has subsequently been released.
original_body: Uncommon Sense has been following the recent arrest of Cuban independent journalist Guillermo Fariñas and calls his detainment a "We told you so" moment. He has subsequently been released.
title: Cuba: Fariñas Arrested & Released
